column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Kai says : " Hey everybody , there 's something I got to tell you . "
#Text=Lin says : " How did you guys make it out of the temple alive ? "
#Text=Mako says : " It was all Bolin .
#Text=You just had to believe in yourself .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You 're right .
#Text=Being moments from death was a pretty good motivator too .
#Text=Of course , we would have never made it back with Kai .
#Text=" Kai says : " Glad I could help .
#Text=So anyway - " Tenzin says : " Did Zaheer get away with Korra ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I 'm afraid so .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Apparently , he can fly now .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What ?
#Text=" Asami says : " How ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Are you sure ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I would n't believe it either if I had n't seen it for myself .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 've heard the legends about Guru Laghima 's ability to fly .
#Text=I 'd never imagine they were true .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " So what 's our next move ?
#Text=" Kai says : " I have an idea .
#Text=" Lin says : " Not right now , kid !
#Text=We need to figure out where Zaheer took Korra .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " And find the airbenders .
#Text=" Kai says : " That 's what I 've been trying to tell you .
#Text=I know where the airbenders are , and I bet it 's where Korra is too .
#Text=" Mako says : " Well , why did n't you say something ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Where are they ?
#Text=How did you find them ?
#Text=" Kai says : " After I got blasted out the sky , I woke up on the side of the mountain , where this little fellow found me .
#Text=I tried to sneak back into the temple , to see if I could rescue anyone , and that 's when I saw the airship leaving .
#Text=I followed it into some caves a few miles from here .
#Text=The giant lady and some people put the airbenders into the caves .
#Text=" Lin says : " Was it Ghazan and Ming - Hua ?
#Text=" Kai says : " No , there were four more of them .
#Text=They did n't look familiar .
#Text=" Mako says : " Must be more Red Lotus members than we thought .
#Text=" Kai says : " I could n't fight them on my own , so I came back here , hoping you guys would show up .
#Text=" Lin says : " We need to get to those caves .
#Text=" Kai says : " How ?
#Text=I do n't think we can all fit on my bison .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Oogi !
#Text=I 'm glad to see you too , old friend .
#Text="
